sentences.en: a ban on the dumping of radioactive waste at sea
sentences.cn: 禁止向海里倾倒放射性废物

sentences.en: a consignment of highly radioactive plutonium
sentences.cn: 发送的一批高放射性钚

sentences.en: Documents leaked to this newspaper purport to reveal that radioactive waste is being illegally dumped on the site.
sentences.cn: 透露给报纸的文件声称是揭露放射性废料正被非法倾倒到此地一事.

sentences.en: Eastern Europe is rapidly becoming a dumping-ground for radioactive residues.
sentences.cn: 东欧迅速成为放射性残渣的倾倒场。

sentences.en: People should keep away from the radioactive waste.
sentences.cn: 人们应远离放射性废物.

sentences.en: Pitchblende and chalcolite are much more radioactive than uranium itself.
sentences.cn: 沥清铀矿和铜铀云母比纯铀的放射性强得多.

sentences.en: Radioactive waste is simply spent fuel.
sentences.cn: 放射性废物就是用后的燃料。

sentences.en: Radioactive water had seeped into underground reservoirs.
sentences.cn: 放射性水已经渗入地下蓄水层中。

sentences.en: the problem of how to dispose of radioactive waste
sentences.cn: 如何处理放射性废物的问题

sentences.en: The radioactive material is stored in a special radiation - proof container.
sentences.cn: 放射性材料储存在防辐射的特殊容器里.

sentences.en: The waste is safely locked away until it is no longer radioactive.
sentences.cn: 废料被安全储存起来，直到其不再有辐射性。

sentences.en: There is a danger of serious contamination from radioactive waste.
sentences.cn: 放射性废弃物有严重污染的危险.

sentences.en: They were exposed to radioactive fallout during nuclear weapons tests.
sentences.cn: 在核武器试验中他们暴露在放射性尘埃之下。

sentences.en: Tritium is one of the mildest radioactive isotopes.
sentences.cn: 氚是最和缓的放射性同位素之一.

sentences.en: Unlike helium - 4, it cannot be produced by radioactive decay.
sentences.cn: 与氦 - 4不同之处是, 氦-3不能由放射性衰变产生.

sentences.en: When the organism dies, no new radioactive carbon is assimilated.
sentences.cn: 机体死后, 不能再吸取新的放射性碳.

sentences.en: Wine is radioactive but few people stop drinking it on that account.
sentences.cn: 酒是有放射性的，可是很少有人因此而戒酒。
